name: Feel The Fear
description:
EXPLORE THE DARK TO SEEK THE LIGHT 

Interactive horror game with cutscenes, jumpscare, puzzles, short story, dialogue, sound effect and EVIL.

Make sure to EXPLORE every room and INTERACT with objects.

Share Game ENDING experience in comments, provide rating based on your experience and FOLLOW me for more game with plots and dark humor.

  • WASD - Movement.
  • SPACE - Jump.
  • E - Interact.
  • I - Open inventory & ESC - Close inventory.
  • LEFT & RIGHT ARROW - Switch inventory items.
  • LEFTMOUSE - Use weapon.
